duties_responsibilities.duty: Enter prescription information including patient searches, prescriber searches, drug selection, and basic documentation.
Accept customer and prescription information required to process new and refill prescriptions.
Retrieve medication from inventory and put them into prescription containers.
Assist with maintaining the Pharmacy department by keeping it clean and in order.
Assist in inventory management processes including order review, inventory returns, restocking shelves, and physical inventory preparation.
Administer Rite Aid programs including FlavoRx, Living More, etc.

education_certification.credential: H.S. Diploma or General Education Degree (GED) required.
